'''Ghost Pets''' is an add-on developed by ''AriaCreations'' as part of the [[Beyond the Pale Garden]] event and advertised by [[Mojang Studios]] in [[Minecraft Monthly|''Minecraft Monthly'']].
[[File:Ghost Pets Add-On Key art.webp|thumb|300px|key art]]

== Additions ==

=== Items ===
* [[File:glow dye gpa.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Glow Dye
** Can be created from Glowing Flower.
** Used as a currency in Trader.
* [[File:food bowl gpa.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Food Bowl
* [[File:glowing berry gpa.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Glowing Berry
** Can be crafted from [[sweet berries]] and glow dye or bought from Trader.
* [[File:glowing bone gpa.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Glowing Bone
** Can be crafted from [[bone]] and glow dye or bought from Trader.
* [[File:glowing carrot gpa.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Glowing Carrot
** Can be crafted from a [[carrot]] and glow dye or bought from Trader.
* [[File:glowing fish gpa.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Glowing Fish
** Can be crafted from any type of [[fish]] and glow dye or bought from Trader.
* [[File:magic wand gpa.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Magic Wand
* [[File:pet food gpa.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Pet Food 
* [[File:trader gpa.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Trader
* [[File:whistle gpa.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Whistle 
==== Spawn Eggs ====
* [[File:Ghost Block Spawn.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] [Summon] Ghost Block
* [[File:Vision Cat Spawn.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] [Summon] Vision Cat
* [[File:Fetch Fox Spawn.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] [Summon] Fetch Fox
* [[File:Glow Rabbit Spawn.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][Summon] Glow Rabbit 
* [[File:Aura Wolf Spawn.png|32px|class=pixel-image]][Summon] Aura Wolf
